ideas.title: Amazon’s new Alexa+ feature adds conversational AI to Ring doorbells
ideas.description: Amazon said that the feature uses the Ring doorbell's video descriptions to determine who the person in front the camera is based on their uniform, actions, and what they are holding.
hooks: AI Doorbell: When Your Ring Knows Who's There
Amazon's Creepy-Cool Alexa Upgrade for Ring
Future of Home Security: AI Meets Doorbell

tips: Use picture-in-picture for live Ring doorbell demo
Include screen recordings of AI recognition process
Create chapter markers for easy navigation

High-contrast typography with technical data visualization. Blend of sleek tech UI and human-centric design elements. Subtle holographic/scanning effect for AI detection visualizations.
